Articles.Content: Just wondering, why did B9 Aerospace take so long to receive an update and why is bac9 no longer a member of the KSP dev team?

No one knows and no one is willing to be found out.

The mods and bac9 silencing (And I mean locking a thread while people discuss what happened) and being silent respectively help nothing on the matter, all we know is that it exists.

So you'll just have to live without it or make it work for the new version locally.

I heard somewhere that the creator of B9 got tired of or just couldn't work on it anymore. That's all I know.

Whether that's from a reliable source I don't know.
